rows.label: tlk70000049_05_msg001
rows.name:
Somewhere deep down, I knew it would
come to this someday.

rows.label: tlk70000049_05_msg002
rows.name:
My lieges, I will no longer ask you to
keep yourselves out of danger.

rows.label: tlk70000049_05_msg003
rows.name:
I ask you only to seize victory in your
mission, and return here to Aletta.

rows.label: tlk70000049_05_msg004
rows.name:
I look forward to the day when I see
you return triumphant.

rows.label: tlk70000049_05_msg005
rows.name:
And, Your Majesty... Though I have
served by your side for a good twenty
years at this point...

rows.label: tlk70000049_05_msg006
rows.name:
I still feel I have not fully repaid the
debt I owe you for turning my empty
life into something truly worthwhile.

rows.label: tlk70000049_05_msg007
rows.name:
I hope to keep repaying that debt for
as long as these old bones will allow it.
So...please do come home safe.
